group_1.textRight: Erm...did something bad happen to you...?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know, I could be mistaken,@but something seems different about you.

group_1.textLeft: (Does my expression give it away...?@Even Miss Tamaki has noticed...)
(And they've been worried about me@as well...)
...I mean, it's not as though something@bad happened...
I just had a bad dream, that's all.

group_1.textRight: Was it scary?

group_1.textLeft: ...In a word, yes.

group_1.textRight: Can I ask what it was about...?

group_1.textLeft: Erm...
(I don't...want to go into detail...)
...It was about me not doing the ritual@correctly.

group_1.textRight: So it was just a dream...?

group_1.textLeft: Well...that's what I assume.

group_1.textRight: Erm, what kind of ritual...?

group_1.textLeft: In our village, we have a tradition called@the Daybreak Ceremony.
On the first day of the year, we carry out a ritual to@appease a cup that seals away evil and calamities.

group_1.textRight: So that's what it is...

group_1.textLeft: ...In my dream, I couldn't quell@the evil held within.

group_1.textRight: Man...what a nasty dream.

group_1.textLeft: Mikoshiba's been in charge all this time, and@she had kept the proper protocol secret...
So it must be that I’m nervous about@doing it right...

group_1.textRight: There's no need to worry.
Our moms and the other villagers are going through@all the old documents that were left behind.
Pardon my intrusion,
but what happens if you fail to quell@this calamity-containing cup?
Has there, perchance, been a specific@message passed down?

group_1.textLeft: What...? How did you know?

group_1.textRight: That's Komachi's expertise.
Yeah, I think in those kinds of legends,
there's usually some element involving@a warning…
...about the disasters that will occur@if the ritual goes wrong.

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday, you said that the whole area around@Kirimine Town would be struck by disaster.
You think the dream is telling you what@specifically would go wrong?
...Everything will be destroyed.
"Kirimine Town will be annihilated without@seeing the first sunrise..."

group_1.textRight: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]THAT'S the kind of calamity@we're talking about?!
I had no idea...
So that's what you saw in@your dream, Shizuka...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...no...it wasn't as bad as that...
It's just...well...
(In truth, the village was destroyed...@and you two...)
(...[chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json]I can't tell them that.)
So...the dream was...just about the ritual@going wrong...

group_1.textRight: So you were anxious because you had a dream that@you couldn't successfully carry out the ritual,
because you knew it was said that@we would all be destroyed...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes, that's what I think.
The people in the village...especially@the elders...believe that,
"If we cannot appease the cup, our village@and Kirimine will perish."
They spoke about things like that.
And I've been told all that since@I was a child...
I've had nightmares about it@in those days, too...

group_1.textRight: It's okay, Shizuka.
We'll help you succeed!
Besides, the Tokime Village has no need@for Mikoshiba anymore.
We'll prove that we can carry out@the ceremony without her,
and we’ll prove that we can protect@our village ourselves.
Let's do everything we can.
Yeah, you're not alone, Shizuka!
Don't keep this all to yourself.
I'm sure Sunao and the others would be@happier that way, don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, you're right. Thank you.

group_1.textCenter: (...I know it's not good to keep things to myself.)
(But the village was decimated by that disaster.)
(It's unthinkable that Charu and Sunao died...)
(I don't want them to hear that...)
(I shouldn't worry about it anymore, either.)

group_1.narration: But was it really that ominous dream@that made me so uneasy...?
Wasn't there something on my mind...@even before then...?
